name: Personio
description: Integrate with Personio to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Employees
tools.description: List employees from Personio. Returns names, emails, departments, and positions.

tools.name: Get Employee
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Personio employee by their ID.

tools.name: List Absences
tools.description: List absence (time-off) records from Personio. Filter by employee, date range, or type.

tools.name: Create Absence
tools.description: Create an absence (time-off) request in Personio for a specific employee.

tools.name: List Attendances
tools.description: List attendance records from Personio. Filter by employee and date range to see clock-in/clock-out data.
